name: setDefaultShareScope
description:
Sets the default sharing for new filters and dashboards for a user.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** Permission to access Jira.

DefaultShareScope.description: Details of the scope of the default sharing for new filters and dashboards.

scope.description:
The scope of the default sharing for new filters and dashboards:

 *  `AUTHENTICATED` Shared with all logged-in users.
 *  `GLOBAL` Shared with all logged-in users. This shows as `AUTHENTICATED` in the response.
 *  `PRIVATE` Not shared with any users.

$block: Details of the scope of the default sharing for new filters and dashboards.
